starts.title: Toss a piece of food into the other player's mouth
starts.extra: If it falls on the floor, thrower has to eat it

starts.title: Balance a cup of water on each other's head
starts.extra: ... Make it a cup of milk or soda

examples.title: Both players do a gentle trust lean
examples.extra: Close your eyes for a 3‑count lean

examples.title: Both players flip a coin to choose who leads
examples.extra: Loser follows one more silly instruction from the winner

examples.title: Both players balance a book while walking side‑by‑side
Current player guides the other 5 slow steps eyes‑closed (spotter hand on shoulder)
Both players walk heel‑to‑toe toward each other
examples.extra: Hold the pose one breath when inches apart

examples.title: Both players do a 10‑second eyes‑closed lean, foreheads near, steadying each other
Both players toss a soft item back and forth increasing distance
examples.extra: Take one extra big step apart

examples.title: Both players do a tiny trust fall from 6 inches with clear catch
Current player stands on a low step; the other spots as you step down backward
Both players balance on one foot facing each other
examples.extra: Reach out and touch fingertips for stability

examples.title: Both players try a slow spin holding both hands
Current player walks backward eyes‑closed while the other calls directions
examples.extra: Trade roles and reduce verbal hints

examples.title: Both players pass around a cup of water without using thumbs
Both players stand on one foot and high‑five
Current player piggyback‑pose leans onto the other
examples.extra: Switch roles and hold for 3 seconds

examples.title: Both players do a slow three‑step dance while balancing a book
examples.extra: Add a turn at the end

examples.title: Current player is blindfolded and must guess which body part the dare accepter presents by smell
Current player stands on a chair while the dare accepter spots
Both players navigate a tiny obstacle course you set for each other
examples.extra: Attempt it eyes‑closed with a verbal guide

examples.title: Both players try a near‑kiss freeze (stop a breath apart)
examples.extra: Hold for a 3‑count while steadying each other

examples.title: Current player slowly leads the other through a doorway eyes‑closed
Both players take 10 steps backward holding hands
Both players walk side‑by‑side with one foot on a line
Current player spins the other then guides you to a chair
examples.extra: Switch roles and increase spin by one turn

examples.title: Both players stand nose‑to‑nose and try not to laugh
Both players trade jackets behind a door or barrier, then reveal
examples.extra: Model the new look for 5 seconds

examples.title: Current player leads a slow trust walk outdoors for 30 seconds (safe area)
Both players attempt a very slow dip with strong footing and spotter hands
examples.extra: Hold for a 3‑count and return safely

examples.title: Both players balance a cup of water on each other's head (over towel) for 5 seconds
Current player blindfolds and the other places a safe object in your palm to identify
examples.extra: Switch roles with a second object
